title: Simply Gluten Free Cupcakes
description: Carol Kicinski, one of the country's top gluten free bloggers, gives you some of her best cupcake recipes for all occasions. Whether you are looking to entertain guests for the holidays or throw a cocktail party or attend a picnic, this book has you covered.Simply Gluten Free Cupcakes contains 16 cupcake recipes plus a BONUS recipe for an easy gluten free flour blend that has the same taste and texture as regular wheat flour. It works for even the most delicate baked goods.Not only does Carol give you recipes, she also gives you a charming story or humorous snippet about how each recipe came about. Not to mention the drool-worthy photos of her delicious cupcakes.Carol's recipes are not just "good for gluten free," they are just plain GOOD! Whether you suffer from Celiac disease, gluten sensitivity or you just want to try a gluten free diet for other health benefits, Simply...Gluten Free Cupcakes is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth.
author: Carol Kicinski
